about_the_game:
Explore the ruins of the apocalypse and embark on your final adventure!

In the apocalyptic world shrouded in destruction, a young girl named Lilith became the last hope. In the game "The Last Eden", players will play the role of Lilith, manipulating her to fly in the vast sky, avoiding enemy attacks, and using courage and strength to protect the last human Eden.

Horizontal aerial shooting

Last Eden is a horizontal board aerial shooting game where players control Lilith to fly freely in the air while avoiding attacks from enemies from all directions. Only your agility and skills can save Lilith from danger and protect her from becoming the last human.

Challenge diverse levels and challenging bosses

The Last Eden has multiple amazing levels, each filled with different challenges and dangers. Players will face various enemy attacks, from simple minions to powerful bosses. Each battle will be a life and death struggle, and only the brave can win!

Explore the world of destruction and discover the light of hope

In The Last Eden, players will traverse the ruins of destruction and explore the ruins of the world. But even in the shadow of the apocalypse, there is still a glimmer of hope. Through every adventure, Lilith will continue to grow, discover her strength and mission, and strive for the future of humanity!

Magnificent visuals and sound effects

The Last Eden boasts stunning visual effects and stunning sound effects, immersing you in the atmosphere of the apocalyptic world. From the vast sky to the shattered city, every scene is filled with meticulous details and heart stopping movements, making you feel like you are in a real apocalyptic world.

Explanation about weapons

Lilith initially only had the most basic weapons, and as the game progresses, she will continue to be upgraded and improved.
Sub weapon: Follow the player's two intelligent mechanical balls, with the function of shooting bullets, and the player can adjust the shooting angle.
Main Weapon - Normal: Basic weapon, fires 3 bullets at a time.
Main Weapon - Machine Gun: Fires more bullets at once, with a faster firing rate.
Main Weapon - Laser: Shoot a laser beam forward that runs through the entire screen and can penetrate multiple enemies.
Main Weapon - Bomb: With great power, it explodes after hitting the enemy, causing range damage.

Instructions for operation

Mobile: W (top), A (left), S (bottom), D (right)
Shooting: Spacebar (laser weapons require holding down the Spacebar)
Adjusting the shooting direction of secondary weapons: Q or E
Switch main weapon: Z

Are you ready?

Are you ready to take on the challenge? Join us and embark on the adventure journey of "Final Eden" together! Download the game, explore this world full of danger and hope, and fight for the future of humanity!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-530 2.93 Ghz, or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11.0 compatible GPU with at least 1GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200 / Intel® Core™ i3-3330
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11.0 compatible GPU with at least 2GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: This is a side scrolling aerial shooting game where players need to operate the last human survivor, Lilith, to move and shoot in the air, use constantly improving weapons to eliminate enemies, complete all levels, and ultimately find her own value in the shattered world.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Korean
